content: आभाष् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To address, speak to, converse with; वैशंपायनश्चंद्रापीडमाबभाषे <ls>K. 117</ls>; कुरुते नालापमाभाषिता <ls>Nāg. 4.</ls> {@--2@} To say or speak (something) (with two <ab>acc.</ab>); आभाषि रामेण वचः कनीयान् <ls>Bk. 3. 51.</ls> {@--3@} To say or speak; सखी वेत्रभृदाबभाषे <ls>R. 6. 82</ls>, <ls n="R.">14. 44.</ls> {@--4@} To name. {@--5@} To talk aloud, shout.
